articles.Description: By Shiri Gaber — Data Scientist, EMC IT Project: Root cause analysis of difference in support hours ROI: Model suggests saving of 500-1,000 support hours on average weekly (up to $5M annually) I have recently made the transition from academic neuroscience to becoming a member of the Data-Science-as-a-Service team in EMC’s IT organization. The change…

articles.Title: [1503.05570] A Data Science Course for Undergraduates
The Role Of Data Science (IT Best Kept Secret Is Optimization)
articles.Description:
I am sure I'll get flamed for this post, given how hyped data science is.  Let me first say that I do not pretend to define what data science is, others, probably more qualified than me, have done it well.   For instance, I like this definition from Dawen Peng, as it speaks to an Operations Research person like me.  I will rather focus on the role data science can have for business.  What I see the most is data scientists analyzing data then publishing reports on insights they found in data.  Just browse over the numerous data science blogs to get examples. 
 
	So far so good? Here comes the flame...

articles.Title: Unlocking March Madness with Data Science
articles.Description: Since 1939, the NCAA has hosted a single-elimination basketball tournament to determine its national champion every spring. This event is unique in that it draws interest across a wide public spectrum, from hoops enthusiasts to casual fans who can’t tell a shot clock from a baseline. Regardless of your basketball IQ, “filling out your bracket” has become a national obsession.

articles.Description: The ubiquity of online communications in the schools opens up new possibilities for entrepreneurs to collect and mine confidential, personally identifiable data about children. articles.Title: How to Evaluate Machine Learning Models, Part 1
articles.Description: New to data science and machine learning? This primer talks about basic concepts in evaluating machine learning models. Part 1 introduces evaluation metrics, dataset, and hyperparameter search. Subsequent parts fill in the details.
